name: WC Contour – Product Bundles Builder for WooCommerce
author: wsjrcatarri

sections.description:
Build Product Configurator with Ease: WC Contour allows you to structure your configurator into a hierarchy of group-subgroup-components, making it effortless to showcase your offerings. From electronics to fashion, from mining to camping, and beyond, WC Contour ensures that your customers find exactly what they’re looking for.

Plugin home page | Demo | Docs

Main Features

  • Dynamic AJAX Product Display – Each component in your product hierarchy is dynamically linked to related products through AJAX technology. When your customers click on a specific component, such as “RAM,” they’ll instantly see a curated selection of products associated with that category or attributes. This not only saves them time but also enhances their shopping experience by offering exactly what they need.
  • Skeleton Loading – Ensures that customers don’t have to wait for content to load.
  • Share Bundles – Share your collection link on social media, in emails, on your website, or with friends and family. Wherever you choose to share, your collection is just a click away.
  • WPML/Polylang compatible
  • Variation Swatches for WooCommerce (or any other swatches plugin) compatible
  • Perfect Brands WooCommerce (or any custom product taxonomy) compatible
  • WPBakery Page Builder (to be added via shortcode) compatible
  • Elementor Page Builder (to be added via shortcode) compatible
  • Gutenber Page Builder (to be added via shortcode) compatible
  • 3 DEMO Import
  • 1 Builder available
  • Made for WooCommerce

Premium Features

  • Saves Bundles in real-time – Saves customer selections to browser’s localStorage
  • Product Compatibility – Instant Compatibility Checks, Alerts. Enhanced User Experience
  • Unlimited Builders available
  • Multiple product selections
  • Extra collapsible sections for additional components
  • Adds component/product image to saved bundle

Saved bundles are securely stored in the database, easily accessible from customer’s account page. Customers can revisit, edit, or expand their selections whenever they desire, ensuring a hassle-free shopping journey.

PC Demo | Bicycle Demo | Camping Demo

WC Contour doesn’t just help you sell products; it helps you sell the right products. Elevate your WooCommerce store with the “Product Compatibility” feature and give your customers the confidence to explore, create, and purchase without hesitation.
sections.installation:
Installing via WordPress

Login to the WordPress Administrator Panel.
Go to Plugins > Add New > Upload.
Click Choose file button and select the zip folder of WC Contour – Product Bundles Builder for WooCommerce plugin and press Install now button.
Click Activate button.

Installing via FTP

Login to your hosting space via an FTP software, e.g. FileZilla.
Unzip the downloaded WC Contour – Product Bundles Builder for WooCommerce plugin folder without making any changes to the folder.
Upload the plugin into the following location wp-content>wp-plugins.
Login to the WordPress Administrator Panel.
Activate WC Contour – Product Bundles Builder for WooCommerce by going to Plugins and pressing Activate button.

Create builder item

Navigate to WC Contour->Builder. Click ‘Add builder’ IconButton. That’s it.
sections.faq:
How do I use this plugin?

Follow Installation guide or watch video tutorial

How to uninstall the plugin?

Simply deactivate and delete the plugin.

short_description: Product Bundles Builder. Create and save customer's bundles.
